title: Project-Based Learning Design for Islamic Economic Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of foundational Islamic finance principles and economic systems, along with basic project management competencies
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in a classroom environment utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can complete a virtual enterprise design project applying the Islamic economic system.
Learners can integrate knowledge across formal and informal learning environments using the MSL (Mobile Seamless Learning) model.
Learners can perform profit model simulations reflecting Islamic finance principles (e.g., prohibition of riba, zakat).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
